body: It says on the rules page, section C, paragraph 3, line 8, that texture packs are strictly not allowes. What's up with that?
body_tagged: It says on the rules page, section C, paragraph 3, line 8, that texture packs are strictly not allowes. What's up with that?
title: Texture Packs aren't allowed?

replies.body:
I think it means texture packs that include x-ray, chest outline, etc.

EDIT: Ninja'd xD
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Well at least someone reads the rules.
replies.body_tagged: Well at least someone reads the rules.

replies.body:
1. X-ray mods or texture packs
It means you are not allowed to have a texture pack that could act like xray
replies.body_tagged:
1. X-ray mods or texture packs

replies.body:
Basically what the others have said.

X-ray texture packs are not allowed on Avicus. I'm not even sure they even work that well, anyways.
